sentences.en: "What time were you planning lunch?"—"Half past twelve, if that's convenient."
sentences.cn: “你打算什么时候吃午饭？”“如果方便的话，12点半。”

sentences.en: "Why didn't you appoint Ron twelve months ago?"—"Good question."
sentences.cn: “你为什么12个月前不任命罗恩呢？”——“问得好。”

sentences.en: Finches start to moult at around twelve weeks of age.
sentences.cn: 燕雀大约在12个星期大小的时候开始换羽毛。

sentences.en: He received a twelve-month jail sentence.
He was almost back to his belligerent mood of twelve months ago.
sentences.cn: 他故态复萌，几乎又像一年前那样咄咄逼人了。

sentences.en: I met some friends and stayed out until eleven or twelve.
sentences.cn: 我见了几个朋友，直到夜里十一二点才回家。

sentences.en: In most jurisdictions, twelve jurors and two alternates are chosen.
sentences.cn: 大多数辖区都会选出12名陪审员和2名候补陪审员。

sentences.en: She displayed her wound to the twelve gentlemen of the jury.
sentences.cn: 她给陪审团的12位男士看了她的伤口。

sentences.en: Some firms expect the guards to work twelve hours a day.
sentences.cn: 有些公司要求保安每天工作12小时。

sentences.en: The clock on the wall showed one minute to twelve.
The seasonally adjusted unemployment figures show a rise of twelve-hundred.
sentences.cn: 受季节影响，失业人数增加了1,200人。

sentences.en: Their son Dylan is twelve (= 12 years old ) .
Twelve extremely good-looking, smooth young men have been picked as finalists.
sentences.cn: 12名特别漂亮精明的青年男子被选为参加决赛的选手。

sentences.en: Twelve hours is the minimum, sixty hours the maximum.
Twelve inmates have been killed during a riot at the prison.
sentences.cn: 12名犯人在一场监狱暴乱中被杀害。

sentences.en: Twelve potential vaccines are currently being tested on human volunteers.
sentences.cn: 目前正在人类志愿者身上试验12种试用疫苗。

sentences.en: We waited till twelve and we finally got on the plane.
sentences.cn: 我们一直等到12点才终于上了飞机。

words.tran_cn: 第十二的，第十二个的；十二分之一的

phrases.tran_cn: 获得最大成就；达到最高目标；显出全副本领

trans.tran_cn: 十二，十二个，十二点钟，十二岁
